ussr.physics
Interface PhysicsModuleComponent

All Superinterfaces:
PhysicsEntity
All Known Implementing Classes:
JMEModuleComponent
public interface PhysicsModuleComponent
extends PhysicsEntity

A simulated physical module, useable independently of the underlying physics engine.

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI

Method Summary
 void changeNotify()
          Notify the module model associated with this physical module, that a detectable change in the environment has occurred
 Module getModel()
          Get the model module associated with this physics module
 java.awt.Color getModuleComponentColor()
          Get the color of the module component
 PhysicsSimulation getSimulation()
          Obtain a reference to the physics simulation in which this module is located
 PhysicsSimulationHelper getSimulationHelper()
          Obtain a reference to the helper (utility class) for the simulation in which the module is being simulated
 void reset()
          Reset the physics of the module, including velocity/acceleration, rotation, and position.
 void setModuleComponentColor(java.awt.Color color)
          Set the color of the module component
